Class XMLInjectionAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • de.fraunhofer.iem.secucheck.InternalFluentTQL.catalog.XMLInjection.CWE91.XMLInjectionAttack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    public class XMLInjectionAttack
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This class contains the example of XML-Injection. This example has been taken from here
    See Also:
    XML-Injection example, Serialized Form

      void orderSmartWatchWithoutSafe​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      This method orders the new Smart Watch and stores the information in XML file that will be used later while order processing.
      void orderSmartWatchWithSafe​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      This method orders the new Smart Watch and stores the information in XML file that will be used later while order processing safely.

    • Method Detail

      • reviewYourOrder

        public void reviewYourOrder​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                     throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        This method returns the order detail from the xml file.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServlet request from the user.
        response - HttpServlet response to the user.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If fails to create a new DocumentBuilder.
        java.io.IOException - If fails to parse the xml.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If fails to parse the xml.

      • orderSmartWatchWithoutSafe

        public void orderSmartWatchWithoutSafe​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                       org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                       javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        This method orders the new Smart Watch and stores the information in XML file that will be used later while order processing. This method does not use sanitizer therefore this method is vulnerable to XML-Injection.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServlet request from the user.
        response - HttpServlet response to the user.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If fails to create a new DocumentBuilder.
        java.io.IOException - If fails to parse the xml.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If fails to parse the xml.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If fails to get the Transformer object.

      • orderSmartWatchWithSafe

        public void orderSmartWatchWithSafe​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                    org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        This method orders the new Smart Watch and stores the information in XML file that will be used later while order processing safely. This method uses sanitizer therefore this method avoids XML-Injection.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServlet request from the user.
        response - HttpServlet response to the user.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If fails to create a new DocumentBuilder.
        java.io.IOException - If fails to parse the xml.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If fails to parse the xml.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - If fails to get the Transformer object.

      • sanitizeForXML

        public java.lang.String sanitizeForXML​(java.lang.String message)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to sanitize the user input for the XML.
        Parameters:
        message - A value to be stored in XML file.
        Returns:
        Sanitized value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If fails to suppress the library output.
